title: ZZ'Rot, Ascension, Iceborn & Rylai's Lux.
body: That is a complete tank CC sh-tstorm for a Jarvan, Hecarim and Leona to deal with.

replies.body: Since Ancient coin gave me more gold and I took gp10 quints and Seals to capitalise.
Rylias is garbage on lux. What elo does this work in?
Have decent base dmg because of the sustained fighting and low Cooldowns.

rylais and iceborn, + the rest would e ap (roa maybe)
